Helix Connect
LICENSE: License per User.
DELIVERABLE: Software as a Service (SaaS) with activation email.
MANAGEMENT: Helix Connect
CONTENT: Helix Connect, a cloud-hosted security operations and XDR platform with alert correlation, threat hunting (search), and SOAR capabilities. Data (event) ingestion of up to 100MB per user per month. Purchase of the Open XDR add-on is required for data ingestion exceeding the per user entitlement. Data is stored and searchable for 90 days. Purchase of XDR Retention add-on required to extend retention beyond 90 days.
RESTRICTIONS: Minimum 100 users.  For further exceptions, please refer to the Quoting Handbook.

Helix Connect Open XDR for External Data Add-on - 50 GB
LICENSE: Units of Storage Per Day
DELIVERABLE: Software as a Service (SaaS) with activation email.
CONTENT: Extends Helix Connect's capabilities to allow ingestion of events beyond the per user entitlement. Units of storage calculation determines amount of event ingestion allowed per day. Incidents created from events, such as alerts and their corresponding events to the incidents, are kept for 13 months.​
RESTRICTIONS: Must already own the Helix Connect offering. For further exceptions, please refer to the quoting handbook.

XDR Federated Search across Cloud Instances (T)
LICENSE: Per Helix Instance
DELIVERABLE: Cloud Instance Feature (Parent to Child Cloud Instance deployment mode)
CONTENT: Federated Search capability across related Helix Connect and Helix Connect (EPS) Cloud Instances. Available for MSSP, and other pre-authorized Federated Search clients only - for an ability to search across multiple related Helix instances from a parent instance.
REQUIREMENTS: This option is ONLY available for Trellix(T) IAM customers. Helix Connect or Helix Connect (EPS) subscription must be quoted and ordered in conjunction with this additional XDR-FS-T SKU included - in all new and subsequent renewals.

Trellix Automated Response (TAuR) or Automated Response(T)
LICENSE: Per Unit (Customer is entitled to 5 users per instance)
DELIVERABLE: Software download for installation in customer’s hypervisor environment (No hypervisor license or hardware is included)
CONTENT: On-Prem security orchestration and automated response for Helix and third-party SIEMs
Additional comments: Trellix recommends purchasing Trellix Consulting Services along with TAuR On-Prem (for Jumpstart services).
